snippet: Manufacturers in eight countries reported growth in export orders in late 2010 and early 2011, but now those orders are falling or, at best, holding their own.
abstract: Floyd Norris Off The Charts column analyzes slowing manufacturing exports in eight major economies; notes trend is undoing a sharp rise in world trade that followed the 2009 credit crisis.
lead_paragraph: Manufacturers in eight countries reported growth in export orders in late 2010 and early 2011, but now those orders are falling or, at best, holding their own.
